:: Wolfgang :: 

:: Wolfgang advances slowly, and stops when he realises that he is in 
talking distance away from the aliens. ::

Freeze!  You are surrounded!  Who are you, and what are you doing on 
this planet!?!

:: Raises the artic chill over his shoulder, placing his finger 
snuggly over the trigger, ready to fire at the aliens. ::
